EmailTemplate.name: Aerowave Portal Log In Details
EmailTemplate.subject: Aerowave Portal Log In Details {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you again for choosing Aerowave 100. We have been notified that your portal account has been created for [enter tail number]. To log into the Aerowave portal to manage your account:
* Navigate to the url: https://portal.myaerowave.com
* Enter your Login Name: **Your login name will be your tail number, ALL UPPERCASE (examples: N123AB, I-ABCD)
* Enter your Password: **Your password will be your tail number, ALL LOWERCASE (examples: n123ab, i-abcd)
You can use the Aerowave portal site to review your usage, view your purchase history, update your email information and view minutes/calendar thresholds for the assigned tail number.
The first time you log in, please review your email information and if you do not already see your email information/thresholds loaded:
* Please update all information and choose ONE minute notification and ONE Calendar notification.
* Please place check the ENABLE NOTIFICATIONS box
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please reply to XXXXX@honeywell.com. Please include your {!Case.CaseNumber} when sending your reply.
Thank you for your continued business.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
